question:
In light of October 14th being observed as the World Standards Day, consider the following statements:
  1. The observation of the day commenced in the same year as the establishment of the ISO.
  2. The 2019 observation of the day focuses on standardising video compression technology.
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: October 14th was marked as the World Standards Day in 1946 in honour of the people who develop technical agreements that are published as international standards. The ISO or International Standards Organisation was established in 1947. Official celebrations started from 1970 onwards. Statement 2 is correct: The 2019 theme for World Standards Day is ‘Video Standards Create a Global Stage’. This theme was chosen to bring focus on the necessity for standardisation of video compression technology. In 1946, the day was declared by 25 countries. Over time, almost all the countries came into its fold.
